name: Superfly Bonsai
specialties: Bonsai tools, wire, soil components, and pots.
notes: Excellent source for high-quality tools and a wide variety of wire sizes.

name: Meehan's Miniatures
specialties: Wide selection of pre-bonsai material, especially evergreens and maples.
notes: A great place to find unique starter trees. Check their open house dates.

name: Jesse's Pottery
notes: A local artist who sometimes sells at our club meetings. Beautiful, one-of-a-kind pots.

name: Stone Lantern Publishing
specialties: Bonsai books, magazines, and some tools.
notes: A long-standing online store for bonsai literature.
